title: Bloomberg Markets: Krumpelman on Opportunities in Stocks
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Krumpelman on Opportunities in Stocks
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jeffrey Krumpelman Chief Investment Officer RiverPoint Capital Management Discussing seeing reasonable valuation, attractive fundamentals and attractive technical data and stocks he likes, including Las Vegas Sands.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
